howItWorks.title: How it works?
howItWorks.desc1: Choose the subscription plan and toys for your kid
howItWorks.desc2: Pay monthly and use toys as long as needed

one.title: Saving time and money
one.desc: Spend time and money on buying toys that your child will forget in a few days? Sounds not too fabulous :( We offer access to 200 toys in just 3 clicks and 15$ per month.

two.title: Early development
two.desc: Who does not want to raise future Curie, Lomonosov, or Sikorsky? We understand the importance of teaching kids through play, so we consult with experts on the selection of toys for early development

three.title: Saving the planet
three.desc: Using our service will help you not only get rid of outgrown or neglected toys cluttering your home, but also to reduce your CO2 emissions by four times. Green planet for the baby!

four.title: The safety of our toys
four.desc: For mothers - safety is above all (especially in our uncertain times)! Our toys are disinfected, as well as undergo quartz, ozonation, and eco-dry cleaning.

one.name: Svetlana K.
one.text: So happy to find out about such service! Already received toys, everything is super nice and of great quality!

two.name: Elena R.
two.text: I'm very happy with our subscription. My daughter is so surprised to receive new toys every month.

three.name: Olga B.
three.text: We are delighted! I already think what to order for the next month!

four.name: Lisa V.
four.text: Honestly, I am amazed by your idea;) The toys are great, new, clean! I want to order new ones and try them all!

about.title: What is Grow With You?
about.description: Grow With You is a service created to simplify a mother's life. We want to relieve you of the worries of constantly looking for new toys for your baby and the headache where to keep the unneeded ones.
about.why1: Why the subscription - you may wonder. The child constantly needs to update toys: it grows, and from mobiles and teethers quickly moves to sorters and puzzles. We help you find all the toys that are best for your baby's early development.
about.why2: Why the subscription for renting toys is the next question. Of course, not all toys become "favorite" for your child: and if the sheep becomes a constant companion for the baby, the pyramid and the interactive cube will fall into disfavor in a month or two.

howItStarted.title: How did it all start?
howItStarted.first: We've promoted responsible consumption and production as a public organization. After researching the problems in these areas, we've wanted to do something that would help people and make their lives more environmentally friendly.
howItStarted.second: Meanwhile, we've talked to mothers and learned that they do not always have time to look for toys and need to buy them constantly: the child grows, develops, and learns about the world through games. At the same time, the period of use of toys is rather short, and then mum needs to think where to store / to whom to give already unneeded toys.
howItStarted.third: Thus was born the idea of a subscription service for children's toys, which allows baby to try many different toys and find the ones he likes. For the mother is it the chance not to spend time and effort on selecting toys and deciding their future.

about.goal: Everything is simple. We want to change the traditional model of kid's toys consumption, which will increase the number of cycles of their use by 4 times.

question1.title: How can I subscribe and pay?
question1.ans: You can subscribe at Grow With You platform by selecting the toys you need and leaving your personal info.

question2.title: How do you disinfect toys?
question2.ans1: Soft toys (plush or felt) get an eco-dry cleaning and ozonation.
question2.ans2: Wooden and plastic toys are disinfected with special disinfectants that are safe for your child.

question3.title: What should I do if the toy is broken or lost?
question3.ans: You do not bear any risks for a broken or a lost toy.

question4.title: What if a kid falls in love with a toy and doesn't want to give it back so quickly?
question4.ans: You can continue to play with it and update the rest of the toys OR buy it out from us with 30% off from the initial retail price.

question5.title: How is the previous box delivered and returned?
question5.ans1: If you live in New York, delivering and returning boxes is carried out to the door by our couriers.
question5.ans2: As we have just launched in New York, for other cities in the US the additional information will be available later.
